about_the_game:
EXPERIENCE THE INTRODUCTION

Play through the first chapter of Worn Out in this demo and spend the first night at your new home.

AN INTRICATE MYSTERY

Worn Out is a choice-driven psychological horror visual novel telling the story of a strange man moving into a new home. Choose what you believe is right and face the consequences in this psychological horror experience.

ESCAPE OR FACE YOUR FATE

Your decisions shape the story. Be careful of what you choose, prepare for what is imminent and always be aware, you can't undo what has been done.

PIECE IT TOGETHER

Discover why things are the way they are. Learn about your past, worry about the future. Remember who you are.

BE TRUTHFUL

Never say anything you don't believe in. Or do. Can anything even stop you? Do you need something to stop you?

And don't forget, everybody makes mistakes.

FEATURES 

  • Demo playtime of 10-30 minutes

  • Completely hand-drawn pixel art

  • Narrative changing depending on your playstyle

  • Many decisions for you to replay and discover different clues and pieces of the story.

  • Multiple endings (Even in the demo!)

content_descriptors.notes: Frequent mentions and depictions of graphic violence, psychological trauma and similarly distressing content. Overall mature content that is targeted for a mature audience.

name: Worn Out Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 Ghz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Additional Notes: The game is a visual novel, it should run on a majority of devices.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Temas sensíveis
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: You just moved into your new home and started your new life, happier than ever. But, it just keeps haunting you and following you. Something, there, around the corner. Do you want to take a look?
